regex.name: get-stream
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='https://www.tvim.tv/script/user/login'): import requests import re
pageUrl=url headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} data ='{"username":"artanlahajipko","cid":"artanlahajipko","password":"wawbdol","remember":false}' r1 = requests.post(pageUrl, headers = headers, data= data) Cookie = re.findall('_ottsessid":"(.*?)"', r1.text)[0]
cookie = {'_ottsessid': Cookie}
headers2 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': 'http://www.tvim.tv/'} pageUrl2='http://www.tvim.tv/script/livekey?chan=supersport1'
source1 = requests.get(pageUrl2, headers=headers2, cookies=cookie) key = re.findall('key":"(.*?)"', source1.text)[0]
pageUrl3='http://stream.tvim.tv/get.str?oid=supersport1&k=' + key
return pageUrl3
